metadata.title: Favicon Generator - Create Favicons in All Sizes | tool-chest
metadata.description: Free online favicon generator. Create favicons in all standard sizes (16x16, 32x32, 192x192, 512x512) from any image. Generate complete favicon packages with manifest files.
